Stará dobrá 1.6 je tady s námi už 18 let, a pořád je to jednou z nejhranějších multiplayer her na světě.
Hra je především založena na dvou teamech Counter-Terroristech (Policie) a Terroristech. Terroristi musí položit bombu a Counter-Terroristi deaktivovat. Sou tam dobrý servery třeba jako Zombie Blood, Surf servery, Only dust a tak dál. Bohužel tam sou i Hackeřy.

Plusy:
1. Teamová hra
2. Módy
3. Skiny

Mínusy:
1. Rozšíření hackingu.

Hře dávám 100%

2000年必玩戲2000年必玩戲2000年必玩戲2000年必玩戲2000年必玩戲2000年必玩戲
This is an ingenious game of its time and I am proud that it is my first.

This is the game that I spent a lot of time playing at friends houses and at my place. Whether it was during birthdays, weekends or schooldays we would all either play vs bots or if someone had internet we would play online. The whole competitive aspect of the game coupled with tryhard kids on bootleg PCs or even at school PCs was rather iconic for the 2000s in my country. Adding skins to the game took a bulk of my time with this game. Have a lot of memories here.
